abstract: Former Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel is indicted on misdemeanor assault charge for allegedly hitting his ex-girlfriend Colleen Crowley and threatening to kill her; other football news noted.
snippet: The former Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel was indicted Tuesday in Dallas on allegations by his ex-girlfriend Colleen Crowley that he hit her and threatened to kill her.
lead_paragraph: The former Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel was indicted Tuesday in Dallas on allegations by his ex-girlfriend Colleen Crowley that he hit her and threatened to kill her.
